description:
Convert your GIF to PNG for higher fidelity and full transparency support. Our free online converter turns animated or static GIFs into high-quality PNG images. While GIF is great for simple animations, PNG offers superior color depth, better transparency, and lossless compression for crisp static graphics.

Note: Animated GIFs are converted to a single static image (first frame). For animated output, try GIF to WebP.

head.title: Convert GIF to PNG Online - Free GIF to PNG Converter | miconvert.com

head.keywords: gif to png, convert gif to png, free gif to png, online gif converter, transparent images
head.og_title: GIF to PNG Converter - Free & Online
head.og_description: Convert GIF images into PNG format with transparency support and high quality. 100% free, fast, and secure.

h1.title: Convert GIF to PNG Online
h1.description: Free and fast GIF to PNG converter with transparency support and high quality. Works instantly on any device, no signup required.

h2.title: Why Convert GIF to PNG?
h2.description:
GIF is limited to 256 colors and suitable for simple animations. PNG is ideal for high-quality static images:

  • Higher Quality: Truecolor (24-bit) + alpha vs GIF's 8-bit palette.
  • Transparency: PNG supports full alpha transparency for smooth edges.
  • Lossless Compression: PNG preserves detail without quality loss.
  • Universal Compatibility: Widely supported across apps and platforms.

h2.title: How to Convert GIF to PNG Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload GIF and select your file.
  2. Wait for processing to complete.
  3. Click Download PNG to save the result.

Animated GIFs: only the first frame is exported as PNG.

h2.title: GIF vs PNG: Key Differences
h2.description:
FeatureGIFPNG
Color depth8-bit (256 colors)Truecolor (24-bit) + alpha
Transparency1-bit mask (on/off)Full alpha transparency
CompressionLossless (LZW)Lossless (DEFLATE)
AnimationSupportedNot supported (static)
Best forSimple animations, stickersLogos, UI, screenshots, static graphics

h2.title: Supported Limits & Formats
h2.description:
• Accepted input: GIF (image/gif)
  • Maximum file size: up to 16 MB per file
  • Output: PNG (.png, MIME image/png)

h2.title: Features of Our GIF to PNG Converter
h2.description:
• 100% free, no watermarks
  • Preserves transparency where present
  • Lossless PNG output
  • Mobile-friendly interface

h2.title: What is GIF?
h2.description: GIF (Graphics Interchange Format) supports basic animation and uses lossless LZW compression, but is restricted to a 256-color palette.

h2.title: What is PNG?
h2.description: PNG (Portable Network Graphics) is a lossless format supporting truecolor and alpha transparency — ideal for high-quality static images.

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• Upload fails: Make sure the file is GIF and ≤ 16 MB.
  • Jagged transparency edges: GIF's 1-bit transparency can look harsh; refine with Background Remover.
  • Need animation: Use GIF to WebP to keep motion.

h2.title: Use Cases: When to Convert GIF to PNG
h2.description:
• Logos & icons needing smooth transparency.
  • Screenshots/UI requiring crisp text and lines.
  • Archiving static frames at higher quality.

faq.question: Is this GIF to PNG converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, the converter is completely free with no hidden charges or subscriptions.

faq.question: Will PNG preserve transparency from GIF?
faq.answer: Yes. GIF's 1-bit transparent areas remain transparent in PNG; for smoother edges, edit the alpha channel after conversion.

faq.question: What happens to animated GIFs?
faq.answer: Only the first frame is converted to a static PNG image. To keep animation, use GIF to WebP.

faq.question: Will I lose quality when converting GIF to PNG?
faq.answer: No. PNG uses lossless compression and supports full color, often improving visual fidelity over 256-color GIF.

faq.question: What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: You can upload images up to 16 MB per file.

faq.question: Are my files safe?
faq.answer: Files are processed automatically and not retained longer than necessary for conversion.

faq.question: Can I convert multiple GIF files at once?
faq.answer: This page converts one file at a time. For bulk needs, repeat the process or use a batch tool.

note: Animated GIFs become static PNGs (first frame). For animated output, convert GIF to WebP.
